item.title: Universal Desktop Apps using Web technologies
item.description: Electron is a framework for creating native desktop applications using web technologies like HTML, CSS and JavaScript. A lot of popular desktop applications are built using GitHub’s Electron, like Visual Studio Code, Slack, Atom, etc. Electron apps are like NodeJS applications bundled with a minimal Chromium browser and uses web pages for UI.
